title: The Manchurian Candidate
actors: Frank Sinatra,Laurence Harvey,Angela Lansbury,James Gregory,Janet Leigh,Henry Silva,Leslie Parrish,John McGiver,Khigh Dhiegh,James Edwards,Douglas Henderson,Albert Paulsen,Barry Kelley,Lloyd Corrigan,Madame Spivy,Bess Flowers,Leoda Richards,Reggie Nalder,Colin Kenny,Bert Stevens,Arthur Tovey,Paul Frees,Whit Bissell,James Yagi
summary: Near the end of the Korean War, a platoon of U.S. soldiers is captured by communists and brainwashed. Following the war, the platoon is returned home, and Sergeant Raymond Shaw is lauded as a hero by the rest of his platoon. However, the platoon commander, Captain Bennett Marco, finds himself plagued by strange nightmares and soon races to uncover a terrible plot.

title: Jerichow
actors: Benno Fürmann,Nina Hoss,Hilmi Sözer,André Hennicke,Claudia Geisler,Marie Gruber,Knut Berger
summary: The Turkish diaspora in Germany proves the catalyst for this noir-flavored drama concerning the unlikely friendship between a veteran of the Afghan-Soviet war and a middle-aged Turk in need of a helping hand.
